short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to copy the page title and url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to easily copy the title and url of the currently active webpage with a single click. It simplifies the process of capturing webpage titles, which can be useful for documentation, research, or sharing links with others.
